mapper.select: select seq, subject, writer, date_format(wdate, '%Y-%m-%d') wdate, hit, datediff(now(), wdate) wgap from board1 order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into board1 values ( 0, #{subject}, #{writer}, #{mail}, password(#{password}), #{content}, 0, #{wip}, now() )
mapper.delete: delete from board1 where password=password(#{password}) and seq=#{seq}
